SpinG3 Class

Extends VectorN
Defined in: src/davinci-eight/math/SpinG3.ts:44
Module: EIGHT

Constructs a SpinG3 from a number[]. For a geometric implementation, use the static methods.

Constructor

()

reflect

(
  • n
)
SpinG3 chainable

Defined in src/davinci-eight/math/SpinG3.ts:589

Sets this Spinor to the value of its reflection in the plane orthogonal to n. The geometric formula for bivector reflection is B' = n * B * n.

Parameters:

  • n VectorE3

Returns:

SpinG3:

this

SpinG3:

rotor

(
  • a
  • b
)
SpinG3 chainable

Defined in src/davinci-eight/math/SpinG3.ts:626

Computes a rotor, R, from two vectors, where R = (abs(b) * abs(a) + b * a) / sqrt(2 * (quad(b) * quad(a) + abs(b) * abs(a) * b << a))

Parameters:

  • a VectorE3

    The from vector.

  • b VectorE3

    The to vector.

Returns:

SpinG3:

this The rotor representing a rotation from a to b.
